EFFECT_STIM_MARINE.description: Stimpack increases the Marine's movement speed and firing rate by 50% at the cost of 10 HP. This effect lasts for 11 seconds.

EFFECT_STIM_MARAUDER.description: Stimpack increases the Marauder's movement speed and firing rate by 50% at the cost of 20 HP. This effect lasts for 11 seconds.

SIEGEMODE_SIEGEMODE.description: Deploys the Siege Tank into Siege Mode, gaining increased range and area damage but losing the ability to move. Transformation takes approximately 3 seconds.

UNSIEGE_UNSIEGE.description: Reverts the Siege Tank to Tank Mode, allowing it to move but reducing its range and removing splash damage. Transformation takes approximately 3 seconds.

BEHAVIOR_CLOAKON_BANSHEE.description: Enables the Banshee to become invisible to enemy units without detection. The ability drains energy over time while active.

BEHAVIOR_CLOAKON_GHOST.description: Allows the Ghost to become invisible to enemy units without detection. The ability consumes energy over time while active.

EFFECT_GHOSTSNIPE.description: Steady Targeting allows the Ghost to fire a sniper round after 1.43 seconds of aiming, dealing 130 (+40 vs Psionic) damage to biological units. Ignores armor.

EMP_EMP.description: EMP Round removes up to 100 shields and energy from units in the target area. Also reveals cloaked and burrowed units.

EFFECT_CHARGE.description: Charge allows Zealots to quickly close the distance to enemy units within range 4. Has a 7-second cooldown and significantly increases movement speed for 2.5 seconds.

EFFECT_BLINK_STALKER.description: Blink allows Stalkers to instantly teleport to a nearby location within range 8 that is not obscured by fog of war. Has a 7-second cooldown.

PSISTORM_PSISTORM.description: Psionic Storm creates a devastating area of effect spell that deals 80 damage over 2.85 seconds to all units in the target area. Costs 75 energy and has a range of 9.

FEEDBACK_FEEDBACK.description: Feedback drains all energy from target unit and deals 0.5 damage per point of energy drained. Costs 50 energy and has a range of 10.

MORPH_ARCHON.description: Sacrifices 2 Templars to create an Archon. The transformation takes approximately 8.57 seconds.

EFFECT_SHADOWSTRIDE.description: Shadow Stride allows the Dark Templar to teleport to a nearby target location within range 8. Has a 14-second cooldown.

FORCEFIELD_FORCEFIELD.description: Creates a barrier that lasts 11 seconds and impedes movement of ground units. Massive units will shatter Force Fields on contact. Costs 50 energy.

GUARDIANSHIELD_GUARDIANSHIELD.description: Creates a range 4.5 aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts 12.86 seconds and costs 75 energy.

HALLUCINATION_ZEALOT.description: Creates hallucinations of Zealots that cannot deal damage but can confuse enemies. Costs 75 energy.

EFFECT_PURIFICATIONNOVA.description: Shoots out a ball of energy that detonates after 2.1 seconds, dealing 100 splash damage and an additional 100 shield damage to nearby ground units. Has a 21.4-second cooldown.

GRAVITONBEAM_GRAVITONBEAM.description: Makes the target unit float in the air for 7 seconds, disabling its abilities. Massive units are immune. Costs 50 energy and has range 4.

ORACLEREVELATION_ORACLEREVELATION.description: Causes enemy units and structures within the target area to grant vision for 20 seconds. Reveals cloaked or burrowed units. Costs 25 energy.

BUILD_STASISTRAP.description: Places a cloaked Stasis Ward that traps nearby enemies in stasis for 21 seconds when activated. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.

BEHAVIOR_PULSARBEAMON.description: Charges the Oracle's Pulsar Beam, which does 15 (+7 vs Light) spell damage to ground units while active. Drains energy over time.

EFFECT_VOIDRAYPRISMATICALIGNMENT.description: Realigns the Void Ray's Prismatic Beam to gain +6 damage vs armored units for 14.3 seconds. Movement speed is reduced by 25% while active.

MORPH_WARPPRISMPHASINGMODE.description: Transforms the Warp Prism to Phasing Mode, generating a power radius similar to a Pylon but preventing movement. Takes 2 seconds.

MORPH_WARPPRISMTRANSPORTMODE.description: Returns the Warp Prism to Transport Mode, allowing it to move and carry units but losing the power field. Takes 2 seconds.

BUILD_INTERCEPTORS.description: Builds up to 8 Interceptors that automatically attack the Carrier's target. Each Interceptor costs 15 minerals and takes 9 seconds to build.

MOTHERSHIPCLOAK_ORACLECLOAKFIELD.description: The Mothership cloaks all nearby units and buildings for 20 seconds. Has a 50-second cooldown and affects units within range 5.

EFFECT_MASSRECALL_STRATEGICRECALL.description: Recalls all player units in the target area to the Mothership. Has a large range and takes 4 seconds to complete.

EFFECT_TIMEWARP.description: After a 1.79 second delay, warps spacetime within the target area for 7 seconds. Enemy units have attack and movement speeds reduced by 50%.

MORPH_WARPGATE.description: Transforms the Gateway into a Warp Gate, allowing units to be warped in anywhere with power. Transformation takes 7 seconds.

MORPH_GATEWAY.description: Transforms the Warp Gate back into a Gateway for standard unit production. Takes 7 seconds to complete.

EFFECT_CHRONOBOOSTENERGYCOST.description: Places target structure in a Chrono Boost, causing it to operate 50% faster for 20 seconds. Costs 50 energy.

EFFECT_MASSRECALL_NEXUS.description: Recalls all units owned by the player in the target area to the Nexus. Has a 130-second cooldown and costs 50 energy.

SHIELDBATTERYRECHARGEEX5_SHIELDBATTERYRE.description: Restores target unit or structure's shields at up to 50 shields per second. Every 3 shields restored drains 1 energy from the Battery.

BURROWDOWN_ZERGLING.description: Buries the Zergling underground, making it invisible to enemies without detection. Burrowed units cannot move or attack but regenerate health faster.

BURROWUP_ZERGLING.description: Returns the Zergling above ground to regain offensive capabilities. Takes 1-2 seconds to complete.

MORPHTOBANELING_BANELING.description: Morphs a Zergling into a Baneling. Costs 25 minerals and 25 gas, takes 14 seconds. Requires a Baneling Nest.

EXPLODE_EXPLODE.description: The Baneling detonates where it stands, dealing splash damage to nearby enemy units and structures in a 2.2 radius.

BEHAVIOR_BUILDINGATTACKON.description: Enables the Baneling to target buildings like any other unit, dealing 80 damage on contact.

BURROWDOWN_ROACH.description: Buries the Roach underground. While burrowed, the Roach regenerates health at 7 HP per second and is invisible to enemies without detection.

BURROWUP_ROACH.description: Returns the Roach above ground, regaining the ability to move and attack normally.

MORPHTORAVAGER_RAVAGER.description: Morphs the Roach into a Ravager. Costs 25 minerals and 75 gas, takes 12.14 seconds and adds 1 supply.

EFFECT_CORROSIVEBILE.description: Launches a missile at the target location, dealing 60 damage to all units and destroying Force Fields in the area. Has a 7-second cooldown and range 9.

BURROWDOWN_HYDRALISK.description: Burrows the Hydralisk underground, making it invisible but unable to move or attack. Regenerates health faster while burrowed.

BURROWUP_HYDRALISK.description: Unburrows the Hydralisk, allowing it to move and attack again.

HYDRALISKFRENZY_HYDRALISKFRENZY.description: Frenzy makes the Hydralisk immune to snare, stun, mind control, and movement altering effects permanently.

MORPH_LURKER.description: Morphs the Hydralisk into a Lurker. Costs 50 minerals and 100 gas, takes 18.04 seconds. Requires a Lurker Den.

BURROWDOWN_LURKER.description: Burrows the Lurker, enabling it to attack with its subterranean spines while remaining invisible to enemies without detection.

BURROWUP_LURKER.description: Unburrows the Lurker, making it visible but unable to attack until it burrows again.

BEHAVIOR_HOLDFIREON_LURKER.description: Toggles the Lurker's attack behavior, allowing it to hold fire even when enemies are in range.

BURROWDOWN_INFESTOR.description: Burrows the Infestor underground, making it invisible and allowing it to regenerate energy faster.

BURROWUP_INFESTOR.description: Unburrows the Infestor, allowing it to move normally above ground.

NEURALPARASITE_NEURALPARASITE.description: Temporarily takes control of target enemy unit for 11 seconds. Costs 100 energy and has range 8, extending to 14 while channeling.

FUNGALGROWTH_FUNGALGROWTH.description: Target units take 25 damage over 3 seconds and have movement speed reduced by 75%. Reveals cloaked units and prevents Blink/Tactical Jump.

AMORPHOUSARMORCLOUD_AMORPHOUSARMORCLOUD.description: Creates a shroud that reduces damage taken from air units by 50% for ground units underneath. Lasts 11 seconds.

BURROWDOWN_ULTRALISK.description: Burrows the Ultralisk underground, making it invisible but unable to move or attack. Regenerates health faster while burrowed.

BURROWUP_ULTRALISK.description: Unburrows the Ultralisk, allowing it to move and attack normally.

EFFECT_INJECTLARVA.description: Injects 3 Larva eggs into a Hatchery which hatch after 29 seconds. Costs 25 energy and has a 1.8-second cooldown.

BUILD_CREEPTUMOR.description: Places a Creep Tumor at the targeted location. The tumor generates Creep and can spawn one other tumor within range 10.

TRANSFUSION_TRANSFUSION.description: Instantly heals a target biological unit for 75 health, with an additional 50 health regenerating over 7 seconds. Can only be used on Creep.

BURROWDOWN_QUEEN.description: Burrows the Queen underground, making it invisible and allowing faster health regeneration.

BURROWUP_QUEEN.description: Unburrows the Queen, allowing it to move and use abilities normally.

MORPH_OVERLORDTRANSPORT.description: Enables the Overlord to transport units with a cargo space of 8. Costs 25 minerals and 25 gas, takes 15 seconds. Requires a Lair.

MORPH_OVERSEER.description: Morphs the Overlord into an Overseer, gaining detection abilities. Costs 50 minerals and 50 gas, takes 12 seconds. Requires a Lair.

BEHAVIOR_GENERATECREEPON.description: Makes the Overlord generate Creep when stationary, expanding the Zerg's territory and providing movement bonuses to Zerg units.

SPAWNCHANGELING_SPAWNCHANGELING.description: Spawns a Changeling that can disguise itself as enemy units for scouting. Costs 50 energy and lasts 107 seconds.

CONTAMINATE_CONTAMINATE.description: Covers an enemy structure in slime, preventing it from training units or researching upgrades for 21 seconds. Costs 125 energy.

MORPH_OVERSIGHTMODE.description: Grants the Overseer 25% wider vision but removes its ability to move. Can be canceled after activation.

MORPH_OVERSEERMODE.description: Restores the Overseer's ability to move and returns its vision to normal radius.

MORPHTOBROODLORD_BROODLORD.description: Morphs the Corruptor into a Brood Lord. Costs 150 minerals and 150 gas, takes 24.17 seconds. Requires a Greater Spire.

CAUSTICSPRAY_CAUSTICSPRAY.description: Channels acid that deals 7 damage per second initially, increasing to 35 damage per second. Can only target structures.

BLINDINGCLOUD_BLINDINGCLOUD.description: Creates a cloud for 5.71 seconds that reduces attack range of ground units underneath to melee range. Costs 100 energy.

EFFECT_ABDUCT.description: Pulls a target unit to the location of the Viper. Costs 75 energy and has range 9.

PARASITICBOMB_PARASITICBOMB.description: Creates a parasitic cloud that deals 120 damage over 7 seconds to the target and nearby air units. Costs 125 energy.

VIPERCONSUMESTRUCTURE_VIPERCONSUME.description: Consumes 150 life from a friendly structure over 14 seconds, converting the damage into 50 energy. Has a 1-second cooldown.

EFFECT_SPAWNLOCUSTS.description: Spawns 2 Locusts with 18-second timed life. Has a 43-second cooldown and can be used while burrowed.

BURROWDOWN_SWARMHOST.description: Burrows the Swarm Host underground, making it invisible and allowing it to spawn Locusts.

EFFECT_LOCUSTSWOOP.description: Orders the Locust to land at the targeted location, allowing it to attack ground units. Has range 6.

SPINECRAWLERUPROOT_SPINECRAWLERUPROOT.description: Allows the Spine Crawler to uproot and move to a new location. While uprooted, it has speed 1.4 off creep and 3.5 on creep.

SPINECRAWLERROOT_SPINECRAWLERROOT.description: Roots the Spine Crawler to the ground, gaining attack ability. Can only be performed on Creep. Takes 12 seconds.

SPORECRAWLERUPROOT_SPORECRAWLERUPROOT.description: Allows the Spore Crawler to uproot and move. While uprooted, it loses detection ability but can relocate.

SPORECRAWLERROOT_SPORECRAWLERROOT.description: Roots the Spore Crawler to the ground, gaining attack and detection abilities. Can only be performed on Creep. Takes 6 seconds.

BUILD_NYDUSWORM.description: Creates a Nydus Worm at the target location, allowing units to travel through the underground network.

KD8CHARGE_KD8CHARGE.description: Explodes after a short delay, dealing 5 damage and knocking back nearby units in a radius of 2. Has a 14-second cooldown.

EFFECT_REPAIR_SCV.description: SCVs can repair friendly mechanical units and Terran buildings, restoring health at the cost of minerals and gas.

MORPH_HELLBAT.description: Transforms the Hellion into Hellbat form, becoming a ground melee unit. Requires an Armory and takes 2.86-3.04 seconds.

MORPH_HELLION.description: Transforms the Hellbat back into Hellion form, becoming a fast ranged unit. Takes 2.86-3.04 seconds.

BURROWDOWN_WIDOWMINE.description: Burrows the Widow Mine and activates its weapon. Cannot move while burrowed but can attack nearby units.

BURROWUP_WIDOWMINE.description: Unburrows the Widow Mine, allowing it to move but deactivating its weapon.

WIDOWMINEATTACK_WIDOWMINEATTACK.description: Fires missiles at nearby enemy units when burrowed, dealing 125 (+35 vs shields) damage to primary target and splash damage to nearby units.

LOCKON_LOCKON.description: Locks weapons on target unit, increasing range to 15 and allowing movement while firing. Lasts 14.28 seconds with a 2.86-second cooldown.

MORPH_THORHIGHIMPACTMODE.description: Activates High Impact Payload mode, using 250mm Punisher Cannons against air targets for heavy single-target damage.

MORPH_THOREXPLOSIVEMODE.description: Arms Explosive Payload mode, using Javelin missiles that deal splash damage to air units and bonus damage to Light units.

MORPH_VIKINGASSAULTMODE.description: Transforms the Viking into Assault Mode, becoming a ground unit with ground attack capabilities. Takes 1.67-2.03 seconds.

MORPH_VIKINGFIGHTERMODE.description: Transforms the Viking into Fighter Mode, becoming an air unit with anti-air attack. Takes 1.67-2.02 seconds.

MORPH_LIBERATORAGMODE.description: Deploys into Defender Mode, gaining ability to attack ground units with increased range but losing mobility. Takes 2.89 seconds.

MORPH_LIBERATORAAMODE.description: Reverts to Fighter Mode, regaining mobility and air-to-air attack but losing ground attack capability. Takes 1.46 seconds.

MEDIVACHEAL_HEAL.description: Automatically heals nearby friendly biological units. Consumes 1 energy per 4 HP healed and has range 4.

EFFECT_MEDIVACIGNITEAFTERBURNERS.description: Speed boost that increases movement speed to 5.95 and acceleration to 1400 for 4.3 seconds. Has a 14-second cooldown.

BUILDAUTOTURRET_AUTOTURRET.description: Drops an Auto-Turret at the target location that lasts 7.9 seconds and attacks nearby enemies. Costs 50 energy.

EFFECT_ANTIARMORMISSILE.description: Deploys a missile that reduces armor and shield armor of affected units by 2 for 21 seconds. Costs 75 energy.

EFFECT_INTERFERENCEMATRIX.description: Disables a target unit, preventing it from attacking or using abilities for 11 seconds. Can only target mechanical and psionic units.

EFFECT_TACTICALJUMP.description: After 4 seconds, warps to the target location. Battlecruiser is invincible while warping but vulnerable for 1 second before teleporting.

YAMATO_YAMATOGUN.description: Blasts a target with a devastating plasma cannon after 2 seconds, causing 240 damage. Has a 71-second cooldown.

CALLDOWNMULE_CALLDOWNMULE.description: Calls down a MULE that gathers minerals faster than SCVs and lasts for 64 seconds. Costs 50 energy.

SCANNERSWEEP_SCAN.description: Scans a target location revealing cloaked, burrowed or hallucinated units for 9 seconds. Costs 50 energy.

SUPPLYDROP_SUPPLYDROP.description: Calls down additional supplies that permanently increase a Supply Depot's supply by 8 and health to 500. Costs 50 energy.

MORPH_SUPPLYDEPOT_LOWER.description: Lowers the Supply Depot, allowing ground units to move across it. Takes 1 second.

MORPH_SUPPLYDEPOT_RAISE.description: Raises the Supply Depot, blocking ground unit movement. Takes 1 second.

SALVAGEEFFECT_SALVAGE.description: Destroys the building and returns 75% of its cost. Cannot be cancelled once activated. Takes 4 seconds.

LIFT_COMMANDCENTER.description: Lifts off the Command Center, making it airborne and mobile. Takes 1 second.

LAND_COMMANDCENTER.description: Lands the Command Center at the target location. Takes 2 seconds.

UPGRADETOORBITAL_ORBITALCOMMAND.description: Upgrades the Command Center to an Orbital Command, gaining energy-based abilities. Requires a Barracks.

UPGRADETOPLANETARYFORTRESS_PLANETARYFORT.description: Upgrades to a Planetary Fortress, gaining attack capability but losing the ability to lift off. Requires an Engineering Bay.
